Container.Name: binhex-get-iplayer
Container.Overview: get_iplayer has PVR-like capabilities (like Sky+ / TiVo / Series-Link); You can save lists of programme searches which are automatically recorded when they become available so that you can watch them when you choose and on devices that cannot run Adobe Flash Player - even if you don't have adequate broadband speeds or if your broadband streams too slowly at peak hours when you want to watch a programme.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: This is the container path to your downloaded files or user created content.

Config.Name: Variable: VIDEO_SHOWS_NAME
Config.Description: Specify the name of the video shows seperated by a comma to download e.g. 'EastEnders,BBC News'.

Config.Name: Variable: VIDEO_SHOWS_PID
Config.Description: Specify the PID of the video shows seperated by a comma to download e.g. 'm0020zpl,m0020jxw'.

Config.Name: Variable: AUDIO_SHOWS_NAME
Config.Description: Specify the name of the audio shows seperated by a comma to download e.g. 'radio 1's live lounge,radio 1 sound of 2025'.

Config.Name: Variable: AUDIO_SHOWS_PID
Config.Description: Specify the PID of the audio shows seperated by a comma to download e.g. 'p01029mq,p0k7bn64'.

Config.Name: Variable: SCHEDULE
Config.Description: Specify how often to check for new shows, e.g. '12h'.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be DNS and HTTPS checks against google.com.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute if the healthcheck command returns a non zero exit code, if not specified the action will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set the action to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_HOSTNAME
Config.Description: The hostname used when performing HTTPS and DNS healthchecking.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
